_items.title: Items
_items.description: The possible answers available to the learner

text.title: Text
text.description: This text will display as the answer text

altText.title: Alternative text
altText.description: This will be read out by screen readers instead of reading 'text'. Optional for providing alternative text, for example, to specify how a word should be pronounced.

_isPartlyCorrect.title: Mark this option as partly correct

feedback.title: Answer-specific feedback
feedback.description: When 'Selectable items' is set to 1, this can be used to give the user feedback specific to the answer they selected - if incorrect

_score.title: Score
_score.description: If item scoring is enabled, selected item scores are summed to give the question score

_hasItemScoring.title: Enable item scoring
_hasItemScoring.description: When disabled, this question scores 0 for incorrect and 'Question weight' for correct. When enabled, this question scores by summing the scores of the selected options
